mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_id, user_id, product_id, cart_count , product_price, product_option) VALUES (cart_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{productId}, #{cartCount}, #{productPrice}, #{productOption})
mapper.select: SELECT c.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, c.cart_count FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
